description: In the heart of Waverley, lies the MacDonald sports park.  in here you can hike, mtn bike a little, launch your kayak etc.  The trails for walking are easy to follow and they made the most of the hills on one sections as it goes up and down a couple of times.  The mtn bike trails are a work in progress but right now there is a small terrain park to practice your jumps on.  On he road top the park, on the right hand side is American Hill. Aa small hill rich in gold mining history.  There are still lots of scree slopes of debris from the mines.  all the adits have been infilled or have collapsed.
directions: Cobequid Rd in Waverley, turn on the road leading to the sports park by the pond.
title: MacDonald Sports Park and American Hill
